net.sf.mmm.util.nls.base

Class AbstractNlsBundleFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.util.nls.base.AbstractNlsBundleFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NlsBundleFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NlsBundleFactoryImpl

    public abstract class AbstractNlsBundleFactory
extends AbstractComponent
implements NlsBundleFactory
    This is the abstract base implementation of NlsBundleFactory.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AbstractNlsBundleFactory.NlsBundleDescriptor
      Interface describing an NlsBundle interface.
      protected class  AbstractNlsBundleFactory.NlsBundleInvocationHandler
      This inner class is an InvocationHandler for the dynamic NlsBundle instance.
      protected static class  AbstractNlsBundleFactory.NlsBundleMethodInfo
      This inner class holds all the information to be cached for a NlsBundle-method.

    • Method Detail

      • doInitialize

        protected void doInitialize()
        Description copied from class: AbstractComponent
        This method performs the actual initialization. It is called when AbstractComponent.initialize() is invoked for the first time.
        ATTENTION:
        When you override this method from a sub-class you need to do a super.AbstractComponent.doInitialize().
        Overrides:
        doInitialize in class AbstractComponent

      • doInitialized

        protected void doInitialized()
        Description copied from class: AbstractComponent
        This method is invoked at the end of the actual initialization. It is called when AbstractComponent.initialize() is invoked for the first time after AbstractComponent.doInitialize() is completed and initialization-state has changed to initialized.
        ATTENTION:
        When you override this method from a sub-class you need to do a super.AbstractComponent.doInitialized().
        Overrides:
        doInitialized in class AbstractComponent

      • createBundle

        public <BUNDLE extends NlsBundle> BUNDLE createBundle(Class<BUNDLE> bundleInterface)
        Description copied from interface: NlsBundleFactory
        This method dynamically creates an instance for the given bundleInterface.
        Specified by:
        createBundle in interface NlsBundleFactory
        Type Parameters:
        BUNDLE - is the generic type of the requested NlsBundle.
        Parameters:
        bundleInterface - the interface of the requested NlsBundle. Has to be a sub-interface of NlsBundle with according methods.
        Returns:
        an instance of the requested NlsBundle interface.

      • createBundleInternal

        private <BUNDLE extends NlsBundle> BUNDLE createBundleInternal(Class<BUNDLE> bundleInterface)

      • getBundleOptions

        protected NlsBundleOptions getBundleOptions(Class<? extends NlsBundle> bundleInterface)
        This method gets the NlsBundleOptions for the given bundleInterface. If NOT present a default instance is returned.
        Parameters:
        bundleInterface - is the Class reflecting the NlsBundle interface.
        Returns:
        the annotated NlsBundleOptions or the default if bundleInterface is NOT annotated accordingly.

      • createHandler

        protected InvocationHandler createHandler(Class<? extends NlsBundle> bundleInterface)
        This method creates a new InvocationHandler for the given bundleInterface.
        Parameters:
        bundleInterface - is the Class reflecting the NlsBundle interface.
        Returns:
        the InvocationHandler for the given bundleInterface.

      • getNlsBundleDescriptors

        public Collection<? extends AbstractNlsBundleFactory.NlsBundleDescriptor> getNlsBundleDescriptors()
        Returns:
        a Collection of AbstractNlsBundleFactory.NlsBundleDescriptors for all NlsBundle-interfaces on the classpath following the suggested naming convention NlsBundle*Root.
